channel.title: Starting levels
channel.description: I'm trying to edit the levels you start with, what should i search and where? I've also looked for 'character-skill' in the playerhandler.java, player.java and server.java and cant find it =\

item.title: Starting levels
item.dc:creator: @K_Jay K Jay
item.description:
@K_Jay wrote:

Search for this in your player.java

for (int i = 0; i < playerLevel.length; i++) { // Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 98; playerXP[i] = 1155; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }

Read full topic
